pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Certified Organic Rosehip Oil 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Rosehip Oil Certified Organic Restorative helps improve the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles, skin suppleness and skin radiance.

Thursday Plantation Certified Organic Rosehip Oil helps to restore radiant and healthy looking skin.



Naturally rich in essential fatty acids Omega 3, 6 and 9, Vitamin A and antioxidants, Thursday Plantation Certified Organic Rosehip Oil helps to: 



 - Smooth fine lines and wrinkles.



 - Restore a radiant complexion.



 - Protect the skin from the signs of premature ageing.



- Replenish the skin moisture after sun exposure.



 - Improve the appearance of pigmentation and uneven skin tone.



Thursday Plantation Certified Organic Rosehip Oil is 100% naturally derived, lightweight, non-greasy and suitable for use on all skin types, inclucing oily and sensitive skin.



Certified Organic.



No petrolatum.



No mineral oils or silicon.



No phthalates.



No artificial colours or fragrances.



No synthetic parabens.



No SLS or SLES.



No synthetic preservatives.



No animal derived ingredients or testing.


Vegan.



Product not tested on animals.

Product Claims: Certified Organic. Organic Food Chain.

Size: 25mL












Ingredients

100% Pure Certified Organic Rosa Eglanteria (Rosehip) Seed Oil.

Directions

Each night after cleansing, gently massage a few drops of Thursday Plantation Rosehip Oil onto a slightly camp face. For external use only. Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs. Avoid contact with eyes.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Recyclable where facilities exist.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
